SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Socialchannels] ( [Socialchannels_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Socialchannelstype_Ky] int NULL , [Socialchannels_Titolo] varchar(100) NULL , [Socialchannels_Attivo] bit NULL , [Socialchannels_Url] varchar(MAX) NULL , [Anagrafiche_Ky] int NULL , [Socialchannels_UserInsert] int NULL , [Socialchannels_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Socialchannels_UserDelete] int NULL , [Socialchannels_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Socialchannels_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Socialchannels_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [Lingue_Ky] tinyint NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Socialchannels] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Socialchannels PRIMARY KEY ([Socialchannels_Ky])
